body_html:
@angersson if you're making Python version decisions based on paths that's not a good thing. It appears to be a bug in configure.py

tensorflow-r1.4$ ./configure
You have bazel 0.7.0 installed.
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /usr/bin/python]: 

Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages

$ python --version
Python 3.5.3

$ which python
/usr/bin/python

@angersson if you're making Python version decisions based on paths that's not a good thing.  It appears to be a bug in configure.py
tensorflow-r1.4$ ./configure
You have bazel 0.7.0 installed.
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /usr/bin/python]: 

Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages]

/usr/bin/python
body:
@angersson if you're making Python version decisions based on paths that's not a good thing.  It appears to be a bug in configure.py
```
tensorflow-r1.4$ ./configure
You have bazel 0.7.0 installed.
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /usr/bin/python]: 

Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages]
/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages
```
  
```
$ python --version
Python 3.5.3

$ which python
/usr/bin/python
```
